title: Counsel, Employment Legal - Netherlands (Fixed Term)
overview: Netflix is seeking a Counsel, Employment Legal - Netherlands for a fixed term to provide support on corporate employment matters, advise on employment issues, proactively assess and balance legal risk, stay updated on employment law, handle litigation when necessary, collaborate with global legal team, and maintain a diverse and inclusive workplace. The ideal candidate is a qualified lawyer in the Netherlands with 6 to 12 years of employment law experience, strong English skills, and preferably experience in an international environment.

We are looking for someone who ideally has great passion for the Netflix brand and our content, and who - although temporarily - wants to be a part of our global team of employment lawyers who use their legal knowledge and experience in the most practical and risk-tolerant way possible to support our ever-growing business.

This position is based in our EMEA head office in Amsterdam and will support our operations in The Netherlands. The role reports to the Director, Employment Legal - EMEA also based in Amsterdam. We have multiple corporate offices and a large slate of local language original series and films being produced all across the region in Europe, the Middle East and Africa. This means that we have a wide array of different roles and employees based across our EMEA offices. From Marketing to Business Development and from Tax to Physical production. All these teams are supported by an amazing HR/Talent team and employment legal. While part of this job might be to handle issues on productions, the main focus will be to provide support to our corporate operations.Â
